definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Russian mafias headquarter was based in Chicago, America.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯黑手党的总部是总部设在美国的芝加哥。

sentences.english: His election campaign was bankrolled by the Mafia .
sentences.chinese: 他的竞选活动有黑手党的财务资助。

sentences.english: The organization is a sort of Ku Klux Klan in the industrial sphere.
sentences.chinese: 这个组织在工业界类似于黑手党。

sentences.english: This was a threat, of course, familiar to those who have been visited by the mafia.
sentences.chinese: 很明显，这是一个威胁，很有黑手党的范儿。

sentences.english: Mobster thugs sitting in cafes, sipping tea in little glasses.
sentences.chinese: 那帮坐在咖啡店里的黑手党，小口喝着小杯子里的茶。

sentences.english: The “Godfather” is a story about the powerful mafia families in New York.
sentences.chinese: 电影《教父》就是有关纽约黑手党的豪门大户的故事。

sentences.english: They have their cosa nostra, we have our triads.
sentences.chinese: 他们有黑手党，我们有三合会。

sentences.english: Or does he just want to get in good with the mafia again?
sentences.chinese: 或者他只是想再次和黑手党们搞好关系？

sentences.english: Would-be drug dealers are caught between the police and the Mafia.
sentences.chinese: 一个打算成为毒品贩的人卷入了警察与黑手党的纷争。

sentences.english: We don t want Farmville or Mafia Wars fans.
sentences.chinese: 我们不想要战争法姆维尔或黑手党的球迷。

definition: bunch of gangsters/criminal gang/organized crime syndicate
dark road/criminal ways/the underworld/see also 白道[bai2 dao4]
triad, Chinese crime gang/triad society, anti-Manchu secret society in Qing-dynasty China
US Central Intelligence Agency, CIA/abbr. for 中央情報局|中央情报局[Zhong1 yang1 Qing2 bao4 ju2]
